subtitle: Every step forward deserves recognition. Mark these special moments on your shared language journey.

milestones.title: First 'I Love You'
milestones.description: Saying those three magic words in your new language for the first time. Frame this momentâ€”it's the beginning of your bilingual love story.

milestones.title: Ordering Dinner Together
milestones.description: Successfully ordering at a restaurant without switching to English. Bonus points if you navigate dietary restrictions and special requests!

milestones.title: Laughing at the Same Joke
milestones.description: Understanding humor in another language is a huge milestone. When you both laugh at a joke without needing translation, you've leveled up together.

milestones.title: Movie Night Without Subtitles
milestones.description: Watching a film in your target language and following the plot without English subtitles. Cuddle up and enjoy your achievement!

milestones.title: Meeting the Family
milestones.description: Having a real conversation with your partner's family in their native language. Awkward moments includedâ€”they're part of the charm.

milestones.title: Your First Argument
milestones.description: Yes, really! Having a disagreement entirely in your new language means you've reached true fluency. Make up in both languages for extra credit.

milestones.title: Dreaming in Your New Language
milestones.description: When one of you wakes up and realizes they were dreaming in the target language. Your brain is officially rewiringâ€”together.

milestones.title: Being Mistaken for Locals
milestones.description: The ultimate validation: someone assumes you're native speakers. Whether at a cafÃ© abroad or in your neighborhood, this calls for a celebration toast!
